name: Document Template Pack

abTest.name: Document Template Pack Copy Test
abTest.description: Testing copy variants (Speed vs. Security) for the Document Template Pack to optimize for downloads.

copy.subtitle: Get instant access to all the real estate contracts and letters you need to close deals faster.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This saves you hours of frustrating guesswork and expensive legal fees. Use professional-grade documents immediately.
copy.target_audience: Investors and agents who need to create legally-sound documents without delays.
copy.pain_point: Creating contracts from scratch is slow, risky, and a major bottleneck to closing a deal.
copy.solution: Our template pack provides instant access to a complete set of customizable documents, letting you secure deals in minutes, not days.

copy.subtitle: Use our complete set of real estate contracts to look professional and protect your interests in every transaction.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This ensures you look credible and are legally protected, giving you peace of mind in every deal you make.
copy.target_audience: Investors who want to ensure they are legally protected and look professional to sellers and partners.
copy.pain_point: Using unprofessional or incomplete documents undermines your credibility and exposes you to unnecessary legal risks.
copy.solution: Our comprehensive template pack ensures you have the right, professional document for every situation, safeguarding your business.

description: A complete set of customizable real estate contracts, agreements, and letters for investors and agents. Instantly download and use in your business.

faqs.question: What formats are included?
faqs.answer: All templates are provided in Word and PDF formats for easy editing.

name: Real Estate Investor's Playbook (Hardcover)

abTest.name: Investor's Playbook Copy Test
abTest.description: Testing copy variants (Actionable Strategy vs. Expert Knowledge) for the Investor's Playbook to optimize sales.

copy.subtitle: Actionable strategies, checklists, and scripts to guide your next investment from start to finish.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This isn't just theory. It's a hands-on guide with checklists and scripts you can use today to find and close deals.
copy.target_audience: Investors looking for a practical, step-by-step guide to execute their deals.
copy.pain_point: It's easy to get stuck or make a costly mistake without a clear, repeatable process to follow.
copy.solution: This playbook provides a proven framework with actionable steps, helping you navigate every stage of a deal with confidence.

copy.subtitle: The essential hardcover guide to mastering the strategies that successful real estate investors use every day.
copy.whatsInItForMe: You get the condensed knowledge of expert investors in one place, giving you an unfair advantage in the market.
copy.target_audience: Investors who want to deepen their knowledge and adopt proven strategies from top performers.
copy.pain_point: Learning through trial and error in real estate is incredibly expensive and slow.
copy.solution: This book fast-tracks your learning curve by providing proven strategies and insights, saving you from common pitfalls.

description: A hardcover book with actionable strategies, checklists, and scripts for real estate investors. Perfect for your desk or bookshelf.

faqs.question: Is this a physical book?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a hardcover shipped to your address.

name: Escrow Service Kit

abTest.name: Escrow Service Kit Copy Test
abTest.description: Testing copy variants (Control vs. Security) for the Escrow Service Kit to optimize for downloads.

copy.subtitle: A complete digital kit with checklists and timelines to manage your escrow process with clarity and control.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This kit demystifies the escrow process, giving you a clear path to follow so you never miss a critical deadline or step.
copy.target_audience: Investors who manage their own closings and want a clear, repeatable process.
copy.pain_point: The escrow process is complex and confusing, and one missed step can delay or even kill a deal.
copy.solution: Our kit provides a step-by-step checklist and timeline, ensuring you stay organized and in control of the entire transaction.

copy.subtitle: Use our escrow toolkit to ensure every transaction is managed securely and efficiently, protecting your investment.
copy.whatsInItForMe: You get peace of mind knowing your transaction is being managed with professional-grade processes.
copy.target_audience: Investors who prioritize the security and integrity of their real estate transactions.
copy.pain_point: A poorly managed escrow process creates risk and anxiety, jeopardizing your hard-earned investment.
copy.solution: This kit provides best practices and clear guidelines to ensure your transaction is handled securely and professionally from start to finish.

description: Everything you need to manage real estate escrow transactions securely and efficiently, including digital checklists, timelines, and best practices.

faqs.question: Does this include legal services?
faqs.answer: No, this is a toolkit for managing the process, not a legal service.

name: Deal Scale Branded Desk Mat

abTest.name: Branded Desk Mat Copy Test
abTest.description: Testing copy variants (Workspace Upgrade vs. Professional Identity) for the Branded Desk Mat to optimize sales.

copy.subtitle: A premium, non-slip desk mat to protect your workspace and keep you organized.
copy.whatsInItForMe: It creates a defined, protected space for your work essentials, reducing clutter and protecting your desk surface.
copy.target_audience: Professionals who want a cleaner, more organized, and protected desk.
copy.pain_point: A cluttered, scratched desk looks unprofessional and feels chaotic.
copy.solution: This large desk mat instantly organizes your workspace and protects it from spills and scratches.

copy.subtitle: Add a touch of professional Deal Scale branding to your home or office desk.
copy.whatsInItForMe: It instantly elevates the look of your office, signaling that you're a serious professional.
copy.target_audience: Deal Scale users who want to create a branded, professional office environment.
copy.pain_point: Your home office setup doesn't look or feel like a serious place of business.
copy.solution: Our branded desk mat provides a simple, stylish way to make your workspace look and feel more professional.

description: A premium, non-slip desk mat with Deal Scale branding. Protects your workspace and adds a professional touch to your office or home desk.

faqs.question: What size is the desk mat?
faqs.answer: The mat measures 31.5 x 15.7 inches and fits most desks.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair

abTest.name: Ergonomic Chair Copy Test
abTest.description: Testing copy variants (Comfort/Productivity vs. Health/Investment) for the Ergonomic Chair to optimize sales.

copy.subtitle: A comfortable, adjustable ergonomic chair designed for hours of productive work without discomfort.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This chair's ergonomic support allows you to stay focused on your work for longer periods without the distraction of back pain.
copy.target_audience: Professionals who spend long hours at a desk and experience discomfort or fatigue.
copy.pain_point: Back pain and discomfort from a bad chair kill your focus and limit how long you can work effectively.
copy.solution: Our ergonomic chair provides adjustable support for your body, eliminating pain and enabling longer, more productive work sessions.

copy.subtitle: Invest in a high-quality ergonomic chair designed for long-term health and productivity.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This is an investment in your physical health and ability to perform at your best, day after day.
copy.target_audience: Health-conscious professionals who see quality equipment as an investment in their performance.
copy.pain_point: A cheap office chair is a short-term fix that leads to long-term health problems and reduced productivity.
copy.solution: This chair is a long-term investment in your well-being, providing the physical support needed for a sustainable and successful career.

description: A comfortable, adjustable ergonomic chair designed for productivity and long work sessions at your home office or workspace.

faqs.question: Is assembly required?
faqs.answer: Minimal assembly is required. Instructions and tools are included.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp

abTest.name: Smart LED Lamp Copy Test
abTest.description: Testing copy variants (Performance/Focus vs. Modern Workspace) for the Smart LED Lamp to optimize sales.

copy.subtitle: A modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness to reduce eye strain during long work sessions.
copy.whatsInItForMe: You get perfect, flicker-free lighting that reduces eye fatigue, helping you stay focused and productive for longer.
copy.target_audience: People who work late nights or in low-light conditions and suffer from eye strain.
copy.pain_point: Poor desk lighting causes eye strain and headaches, cutting your productive hours short.
copy.solution: This smart lamp delivers fully adjustable, flicker-free light, creating the optimal environment to protect your eyes and maintain focus.

copy.subtitle: Upgrade your desk with a sleek, smart LED lamp featuring adjustable color and brightness.
copy.whatsInItForMe: It adds a modern, sophisticated touch to your workspace while providing superior, customizable lighting.
copy.target_audience: Professionals who want to create a modern, stylish, and functional home office.
copy.pain_point: Your old, clunky desk lamp is an eyesore and doesn't provide the right kind of light for different tasks.
copy.solution: This sleek, modern lamp not only looks great but offers total control over your lighting, perfecting your workspace ambiance.

description: A modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Ideal for late-night work or reading at your desk or home office.

faqs.question: Does it support dimming?
faqs.answer: Yes, brightness and color temperature are fully adjustable.
